mapper.select: SELECT COMCD , COMNM , TEL1 , TEL2 , FAX , ZIPCD , ADDR , EMAIL , BOSSNM , BIZNO , UPTAE , JONGMOK , CHARGER , CHARGERTEL , HEAD_COMCD FROM COMINFO ORDER BY COMCD

SELECT COMCD , GRP_CD , CD , CD_NM , SORT_ORDER , REMARK , ITEM1 , ITEM2 , ITEM3 , ITEM4 , ITEM5 , UPD_YN , DEL_YN , USE_YN , REC_SDATE , REC_EDATE , REP_SDATE , REP_EDATE , STARTDATE FROM COT_GRPCD
AND COMCD = #{comcd}
AND GRP_CD = 'CM_SPORTS_CD' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.COMCD , A.CLASS_CD , A.ITEM_CD , B.ITEM_NM , B.COST_AMT , B.SALE_AMT , B.MONTH_CNT , B.GENDER , B.VAT_YN , B.USE_CNT , B.UPD_YN , B.TIME_CHECKYN , B.S_OLD , B.E_OLD , B.ADULT_GUBN , B.BIGO FROM ITEM_CLASS A JOIN PROGRAM_ITEM B ON A.COMCD = B.COMCD AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.COMCD = #{comcd} AND A.CLASS_CD = #{classCd}

SELECT A.COMCD , A.ITEM_CD , B.CLASS_CD , C.CLASS_NM , C.SPORTS_CD , A.PART_CD , A.COST_AMT , A.SALE_AMT , A.MONTH_CNT , A.GENDER , A.VAT_YN , A.USE_CNT , A.UPD_YN , A.TIME_CHECKYN , A.S_OLD , A.E_OLD , A.ADULT_GUBN , C.CLASS_OBJ , C.TRAIN_DAY , Fn_GetUseDayNm(C.TRAIN_DAY) AS TRAIN_DAY_NM , C.TRAIN_STIME , Fn_GetTimeFormat(C.TRAIN_STIME) AS TRAIN_STIME_NM , C.TRAIN_ETIME , Fn_GetTimeFormat(C.TRAIN_ETIME) AS TRAIN_ETIME_NM , CONCAT(Fn_GetTimeFormat(C.TRAIN_STIME), '~', Fn_GetTimeFormat(C.TRAIN_ETIME)) AS TRAIN_TIME_NM , A.ITEM_NM , C.CAPA , C.CS_CAPA , C.WEB_CAPA , C.CLASS_DESC , C.CLASS_NOTE , C.BIGO , C.CHILD_YN , C.CLASS_PHOTO , C.TDATE_USE_YN , 0 AS SALE_COUNT FROM PROGRAM_ITEM A JOIN ITEM_CLASS B ON A.COMCD = B.COMCD AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD JOIN TRAIN_CLASS C ON A.COMCD = C.COMCD AND B.CLASS_CD = C.CLASS_CD WHERE A.COMCD = #{comcd} AND A.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND B.CLASS_CD = #{classCd}

SELECT COMCD , GRP_CD , CD , CD_NM , SORT_ORDER , REMARK , ITEM1 , ITEM2 , ITEM3 , ITEM4 , ITEM5 , UPD_YN , DEL_YN , USE_YN , REC_SDATE , REC_EDATE , REP_SDATE , REP_EDATE , STARTDATE FROM COT_GRPCD WHERE COMCD = #{comcd} AND CD = #{cd} AND GRP_CD = 'CM_SPORTS_CD' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
select * from class_group cg order by sort , seq
